text:
Sofia Hublitz (born June 1, 1999) is an American actress. She currently stars as Charlotte Byrde in the Netflix series "Ozark" (2017–present). She has also appeared in "MasterChef Junior", "Louie" and "Horace and Pete". She will star in the upcoming movie "What Breaks the Ice".
Hublitz was born in Richmond, Virginia. She lives in New York City.
